casebody.data:
IN RE the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of N.H. (Minor Child); T.H. (Mother) and J.H. (Father), Appellants-Respondents,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-JT-410 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED September 12, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

PYLE , J.

Affirmed.

VAIDIK, C.J., Concurs.

BARNES, Sr.J., Concurs.
